# TWFAssignment
Welcome to the Translation API! This API allows you to translate text from English to French using the Google Translator.

Installation and Working
Clone the repository:

pip install -r requirements.txt

python tranlateApi.py

Test the API by Postman 
https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/87187409/307438285-d33607a6-7698-45c4-af64-766e0a8eb1eb.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..GJ_yTlkbpqKizIjdnVOM6K6HSGLfMiK1g9OEYstUnCI
